snippet.title: Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
We are proud to present one of the first titles for Ghost Ship Publishing:  Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor

Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades.

It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

This is our first spin-off on Deep Rock Galactic (if you do not count the board game) and we are super excited to get this into the hands of both Deep Rock fans and newcomers. The developer is Funday Games, a well-established indie studio from Aarhus, Denmark. We have known the Funday crew for more than a decade and we have absolut trust in their skills and passion. The collaboration with Funday has already been underway for some months now and we can't wait to get our community involved as well. So stay tuned for more info!

Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor is expected to release towards the end of 2023.

WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2321470/Deep_Rock_Galactic_Survivor/

Developed by Funday Games
Published by Ghost Ship Publishing

Find out more:
https://www.ghostship.dk/publishing/

Follow Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/drgsurvivor
Discord:  https://www.discord.gg/drg
Twitter: https://twitter.com/joindeeprock/
